title: Simple Machines and Tools

vocab.definition: Something that helps you do work more easily
A tool that makes work easier
A round object that can roll
A slanted surface that helps move things up or down
A simple machine with a spiral that turns to hold or lift

teachingNotes: Show real tools like scissors, bottle openers, wheeled toys. Demonstrate how ramps make lifting easier. Safety focus.

sample.question: What simple machine helps lift heavy things with less effort?
What simple machine is a slanted surface?
What changes the direction of a pull with a rope and wheel?
What simple machine is used on a jar lid?
What simple machine is a sharp tool like an axe?
What two parts make up a wheelbarrow's helper for moving?
Name a tool that uses a lever.

truefalse.question: A ramp is an inclined plane.
A lever can help lift with less effort.
Pulleys can change the direction of a force.
Wheels and axles make it harder to move things.
A screw is a kind of inclined plane.
Wedges can split or cut materials.
Simple machines always make things heavier.
